title: Module 2 Quiz: Environmental Stewardship and Net Zero

questions.question: Which geothermal station is now operational and can power approximately 200,000 homes?
questions.questionHtml: Which geothermal station is now operational and can power approximately 200,000 homes?
questions.feedback: Tauhara is Contact's newest geothermal station, now operational and capable of powering approximately 200,000 homes with clean, renewable energy.
questions.feedbackHtml: Tauhara is Contact's newest geothermal station, now operational and capable of powering approximately 200,000 homes with clean, renewable energy.

questions.question: How many solar panels will be installed at Kōwhai Park Solar Farm?
questions.questionHtml: How many solar panels will be installed at Kōwhai Park Solar Farm?
questions.feedback: Kōwhai Park Solar Farm near Christchurch Airport will have 300,000 solar panels, making it one of New Zealand's largest solar installations.

questions.question: By what year will Contact cease discharging cooling water into the Waikato River?
questions.questionHtml: By what year will Contact cease discharging cooling water into the Waikato River?
questions.feedback: Contact has committed to ceasing cooling water discharge into the Waikato River no later than 2031 as part of our water stewardship commitments.
questions.feedbackHtml: Contact has committed to ceasing cooling water discharge into the Waikato River no later than 2031 as part of our water stewardship commitments.

questions.question: What is the first step in Contact's mitigation hierarchy for managing environmental impacts?
questions.questionHtml: What is the first step in Contact's mitigation hierarchy for managing environmental impacts?
questions.feedback: The mitigation hierarchy begins with Avoid—preventing impacts where possible—followed by Minimise, Restore, Offset, and Compensate.
questions.feedbackHtml: The mitigation hierarchy begins with Avoid—preventing impacts where possible—followed by Minimise, Restore, Offset, and Compensate.

questions.question: How many native trees did Contact plant in FY25?
questions.questionHtml: How many native trees did Contact plant in FY25?
questions.feedback: Contact planted 62,978 native trees in FY25, exceeding our commitment to plant more than 20,000 indigenous plants annually.
questions.feedbackHtml: Contact planted 62,978 native trees in FY25, exceeding our commitment to plant more than 20,000 indigenous plants annually.

questions.question: What are Scope 1 emissions?

answers.text: Direct emissions from sources we own or control
answers.textHtml: Direct emissions from sources we own or control

questions.feedback: Scope 1 emissions are direct emissions from sources we own or control, such as burning natural gas in thermal power stations or CO2 from geothermal processes.
questions.feedbackHtml: Scope 1 emissions are direct emissions from sources we own or control, such as burning natural gas in thermal power stations or CO2 from geothermal processes.

questions.question: Which of the following are key strategies Contact uses to reach net zero? (Select all that apply)
questions.questionHtml: Which of the following are key strategies Contact uses to reach net zero? (Select all that apply)
questions.feedback: Contact's net zero strategies include investing in renewable generation, closing thermal plants, and implementing battery storage. Building coal plants would increase emissions, not reduce them.
questions.feedbackHtml: Contact's net zero strategies include investing in renewable generation, closing thermal plants, and implementing battery storage. Building coal plants would increase emissions, not reduce them.

questions.question: What type of battery technology is Contact installing at Glenbrook?
questions.questionHtml: What type of battery technology is Contact installing at Glenbrook?
questions.feedback: Contact is installing a Tesla Megapack battery system at Glenbrook, Auckland, to store excess renewable energy generated during off-peak times.
questions.feedbackHtml: Contact is installing a Tesla Megapack battery system at Glenbrook, Auckland, to store excess renewable energy generated during off-peak times.

questions.question: What is Contact's Science-Based Target for Scope 1 and 2 emissions reduction by 2026?
questions.questionHtml: What is Contact's Science-Based Target for Scope 1 and 2 emissions reduction by 2026?
questions.feedback: Contact's verified Science-Based Target is to reduce Scope 1 and 2 greenhouse gas emissions by 45% by 2026.
questions.feedbackHtml: Contact's verified Science-Based Target is to reduce Scope 1 and 2 greenhouse gas emissions by 45% by 2026.
